text: wahkm -ayha alrswl- bayn alyhwd bima 'anzal allah 'iilayk fi alqran, wala tatabie 'ahwa' aladhin yhtkmwn 'ilyk, wahdharhum 'an ysdduk ean baed ma 'anzal allah 'iilayk fttrk aleamal bh, fa'iina 'aerad hwla' emma tahkum bih faelam 'ana allah yurid 'an ysrfhm ean alhudaa bsbb dhnwb aktsbwha min qbl. wa'iina kthyrana min alnaas lakharjwn ean taeat rbhm
